value:
I quite like this costume...but Seteth
would surely say it is lacking in
decorum if he ever caught sight of it.

In Fódlan, the Horsebow Moon marks
a time of harvest and savoring the
many blessings of the goddess.

All who share in the harvest's bounty
are welcome. Those who would
spurn such gifts, however...$k$pThey must be educated accordingly.

I may be unfamiliar with trickery, but I
shall do my best to live up to this
costume. Now...how do witches act?

It does the spirit good to see Heroes
from so many worlds coming together
to celebrate the harvest.$k$pI am glad to count myself
among them.

I have heard that you are a good
friend to $Nf.$k$pMay the bounty of the goddess
ever provide.

From the bottom of my heart, I am
grateful for this season's bounty.

It may be some time before I can
succeed in playing a trick...

We must always help others in their
darkest hour—for how else can we
expect others to help us in kind?

This bounty serves to illuminate
the path forward.

I am Rhea, archbishop of the Church
of Seiros. I come dressed as a witch
to celebrate the harvest festival.

I was truly elated to receive an
invitation to the harvest festival,
$Nu.$k$pThe people of Askr may not worship
the goddess, but they give thanks for
nature's bounty all the same.$k$pWhether by the goddess's grace or
our own hands, the harvest we reap
ensures our continued prosperity.$k$pIt pleases me to see that this truth is
alive and well even outside of Fódlan.$k$pWe must continue to guide others
so that the smiles brought by this
bounty never disappear.$k$pToday was a valuable reminder of
gratitude and joy that I shall treasure
for many years to come.
はっ
これで
ああっ
いけない…
Prepare to be tricked!
Trick or treat!
Be afraid!
Show me the treats.
Is the festival...over?
*Chuckle*
I'm dressed as a witch. *chuckle* Would you like me to cast a spell on you?
You're as excitable as a child. How darling!
This is a harvest festival, so let us begin by giving our thanks to the goddess.
I adore seeing everyone in their harvest festival costumes. They seem to be enjoying themselves.
Eating sweets can calm the spirit.
What a lively festival... Hm. My mother would be pleased to see it.
I wish to stroll the festival with you. Would you indulge me?
Of course.
Hm?
Feeling festive!
